channel.title: Comments on: Get to know our editors: Danielle Perry
channel.description: Stellar Short Fiction by Women-Identified Writers Since 2010

item.title: By: Jody
item.dc:creator: Jody
item.description: Great interview, Jennifer! Love that you kicked off with a question about Danielle's super powers. Maybe she'll consider joining Lady Morse Code's League of Extraordinary Authoresses. :-) So fun to learn about the amazing women who put this spec collection together with needle, thread, spit, tears and ABC gum. Thanks ladies! Love for LSQ!
